title: Colorado National Monument: Picnics
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Picnics              Enjoy a Picnic       There are several great locations to choose from to enjoy a picnic at Colorado National Monument. Devils Kitchen Picnic Area by the East Entrance has picnic tables, a shade shelter, charcoal grills, a drinking fountain, bathrooms and garbage/recycling. Saddlehorn Picnic Area near the Visitor Center has picnic tables, charcoal grills, a drinking fountain, bathrooms and garbage/recycling.   There are also a few tables under a shade shelter at the Visitor Center, with nearby drinking fountains, bathrooms and garbage/recycling.  Devils Ktichen Picnic Area and Saddlehorn Picnic Area can be reserved for special events, permits and fees apply.    Â     Visitors enjoying a picnic near Saddlehorn Visiotr Center.
